paragraphs.zh-tw: (Music) Text: BeatJazz. BeatJazz is: 1. Live looping, 2. Jazz improvisation And 3. "Gestural" sound design.
paragraphs.en: ♫（音樂）♫ 動感爵士 動感爵士就是 1.現場循環樂段 2. 即興爵士 以及 3. 手勢控制聲音的設計

paragraphs.zh-tw: Accelerometers on each hand read hand position. The color of the lights indicates which sound I am playing.
paragraphs.en: 雙手各佩帶一個 加速感應器 來感應手上的動作 不同的燈光顏色 代表我在演奏不同的音源

paragraphs.zh-tw: Red = Drums, Blue = Bass, Green = Chords, Orange = Leads, Purple = Pads The mouthpiece consists of ... a button, two guitar picks and lots of hot glue.
paragraphs.en: 紅色＝鼓 藍色＝貝斯 綠色＝和弦 橙色＝主奏 紫色＝合成音色 吹口 是由一個按鈕 兩個吉他撥片 和許多高溫固化膠 組合而成

paragraphs.zh-tw: The heads-up display is a smartphone that displays system parameters. Why? To atomize music culture so that ALL past, present and future genres can be studied and abstracted, live.
paragraphs.en: 抬頭顯示器 是一個顯示系統參數的智慧型手機 為甚麼？ 這為了將音樂文化變得簡而易懂 如此便能在現場學習和萃取 所有過去，現在和未來的音樂風格

paragraphs.zh-tw: And "BeatJazzers" become as common as D.J.'s. But mostly ...
paragraphs.en: 以及 讓動感爵士樂家們 可以變得像音樂主持人一樣常見 最主要的⋯⋯

paragraphs.zh-tw: to MAKE the future rather than wait for it.
paragraphs.en: 與其等待未來 不如創造未來
